EmailTemplate.description: New Email Template setup in June 2012
EmailTemplate.name: Pre-term letter for parents
EmailTemplate.subject: Pre-term letter for parents
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The British School of Tashkent Part of The British Schools Group
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Please find attached essential information about routines for the new school year at the British School of Tashkent, commencing Monday 3rd September 2012.
We look forward to welcoming you and your children on that date.
Kind regards,
Уважаемые родители,
Посмотрите, пожалуйста, в приложении важную информацию о распорядке дня на новый учебный год в Битанской школе.
C нетерпением ждем встречи с Вами в понедельник, 3 сентября.
С наилучшими пожеланиями,
Regards,
Administration Team The British School of Tashkent World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Beijing - Kuala Lumpur - Sao Paulo - Manila - Moscow - Guangzhou - Nanjing - Tashkent - Pamplona -Marbella
